member.name: P:umbraco.providers.members.UmbracoMembershipProvider.DefaultMinPasswordLength
member.summary: Override to maintain backwards compatibility with only 4 required length

member.name: P:umbraco.providers.members.UmbracoMembershipProvider.DefaultUseLegacyEncoding
member.summary: Override to maintain backwards compatibility

member.name: P:umbraco.providers.members.UmbracoMembershipProvider.AllowManuallyChangingPassword

member.summary: Initializes the provider.

A collection of the name/value pairs representing the provider-specific attributes specified in the configuration for this provider.
member.exception: The name of the provider is null.

The name of the provider has a length of zero.

member.name: M:umbraco.providers.members.UmbracoMembershipProvider.PerformChangePassword(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Processes a request to update the password for a membership user.

This property is ignore for this provider
The new password for the specified user.

member.summary: Processes a request to update the password question and answer for a membership user.
member.param: The user to change the password question and answer for.
The password for the specified user.
The new password question for the specified user.
The new password answer for the specified user.
member.returns: true if the password question and answer are updated successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:umbraco.providers.members.UmbracoMembershipProvider.GetUser(System.String,System.Boolean)

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the specified user is in the specified role for the configured applicationName.
member.param: The user name to search for.
The role to search in.
member.returns: true if the specified user is in the specified role for the configured applicationName; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:umbraco.providers.UsersRoleProvider.RemoveUsersFromRoles(System.String[],System.String[])
member.summary: Removes the specified user names from the specified roles for the configured applicationName.
member.param: A string array of user names to be removed from the specified roles.
A string array of role names to remove the specified user names from.

member.name: M:umbraco.providers.UsersRoleProvider.RoleExists(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the specified role name already exists in the role data source for the configured applicationName.
member.param: The name of the role to search for in the data source.
member.returns: true if the role name already exists in the data source for the configured applicationName; otherwise, false.
